item.title: pypi-transparency
item.description: The goal of pypi-transparency is very similar to the underlying motivation for the Golang team’s Checksum Database (also built with Trillian). Even though, PyPi provides hashes of the content of packages it hosts, the developer must trust that PyPi’s data is consistent. One ambition with pypi-transparency is to provide a companion, tamperproof log of PyPi package files in order to provide a double-check of these hashes. It is important to understand what this does (and does not) provide.
